name: Rocket Man
description: A Jetpac clone that was released as a type-in listing from issue 10-11 / 1987 of Computer Kontakt dated October / November 1987.

name: Aspen Ski!
description: Sin descripción

name: Lad 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Nintendo Switch Edition
description: The critically acclaimed Guilty Gear Strive arrives on Nintendo Switch for the first time, complete with the first three season passes of DLC to make for a total of 28 playable characters!

name: Kyuukyoku Harikiri Koushien
description: Kyuukyoku Harikiri Koushien is a baseball game for the Famicom, not unlike any of the others. The main drawing point with this one is that there are close to 100 teams you can choose from. Plus, the traditional baseball stats are not used; rather each player has a set rating for strength and speed, and that is all you get to go by. A neat addition is the power meter, which can help your team get ahead if used properly.

name: Plane Graveyard Simulator
description: Visit the world's largest airplane graveyard and explore the huge desert filled with wrecks. Hundreds of tons of steel and rusted electronics are waiting. Dismantle airplanes, earn money from scrap, and complete tasks from your employer!

name: The Town of Nie
description: The protagonist is a young man named Hisora, who works several blue-collar part-time jobs. One day, he suddenly finds himself lost in a strange world. This is an otherworldly boys-love fantasy in which Hisora will risk his life to find a way back to his world.

name: Botworld Odyssey
description: Venture out into a huge and diverse open world to discover new bots, collect rare scrap to build them, and deploy them in tactical real-time battles on your quest to become the world’s greatest Botmaster.

name: Metro Quester: Osaka
description:
METRO QUESTER | OSAKA is a dungeon exploration RPG based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a deep game system designed by Hironori Kato that offers the excitement and surprises reminiscent of 1980s computer games through hack and slash.

Moving the location to the city of water, Osaka, it features 32 characters and 8 classes, enjoyable combo skills, numerous customizable weapons, a bestiary, and features like NEW GAME+ for replayability, offering plenty of depth for dedicated gamers.

name: Possible One: Lunar Industries
description: Possible One is the ultimate colony management game set in space, and the only space-related RTS game based on proven or very feasible technologies, avoiding sci-fi.

name: Match In Peace
description: In this terrifying, genre-busting strategy game, find and match monster pairs to unleash their terror on your enemies. Battle in PvP, conquer the Tower and Roguelike modes and find alchemy components to craft new powerful monsters. Can you keep your calm under pressure and Match In Peace?

name: Hungry Horrors
description: Face legendary creatures from British and Irish folklore in this roguelite deck builder where cooking replaces combat. As a princess, you must prepare dishes to feed these monsters or risk becoming their next meal.

name: Gulping Snake
description: Gulping Snake is a simple, but not easy, 2D puzzle game.

name: Platform Control
description: In Platform Control you can control both your player character and the platforms he has to jump on to get to the trophy and complete the level. Unlock more and more unique platforms as you progress through the levels and sharpen your problem solving skills!

name: 1 Fast Fight
description: 1 Fast Fight or 1ff.wad is 12 speedmaps in boom format/cl9 with a time limit of 1 hour each. The maps are generally small and fast paced with a twist. All enemies have their healthy vastly decreased, but have their movement speed vastly increased to compensate, the idea was the make everything "go by faster".

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 4
description: I paid more artists to hide dogs and bones in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 4
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 5
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 3
description: I paid more artists to hide dogs and bones in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Hidey Ducks: Seasons
description: A charming hidden-object game where you find 400 ducks across 8 seasonal scenes. Use your umbrella power to clear obstacles like rain and snow, collect and upgrade stickers for passive income, and unlock upgrades for enhanced gameplay. Optional challenge mode adds extra excitement!

name: Net.Attack()
description: Unleash your inner hacker skills and code your way to victory in a game where complex algorithms meet intuitive gameplay. Net.Attack() is a dynamic top-down survivor-like roguelite where you create your own abilities with a node-based coding mechanic. Go and dominate the virtual battleboards.

name: Dagger Froggy
description: Dagger Froggy is a small action Roguelike, Where you face hordes of enemies... Cute? With each round you get stronger, But so do the cute creatures. >:)

name: Dust
description: A Western by IkeC

name: B-Air Micro
description: Made for #lowrezjam and carried on afterward, B-Air Micro is a roguelike-like in the vein of games like Spelunky. Explore the treacherous caverns deep below the earth and define your aspirations as one of eleven unique classes. Do you have the courage to venture to the bottom?

name: Gum
description:
Cursed with sticky autonomy, you play as a Gum Person with a thirst for adventure. Navigate your way out of sticky situations and wonder to yourself how much easier it would be if you didn't stick to everything.

Gum is a puzzle game that I've been working on for a little over a week. It started as a quick idea on paper and quickly proved that it had enough complexity to create a full-fledged puzzle game out of. Feedback is appreciated

name: Geomancers
description: Geomancers is a PVP card game turn-based shooter where you command powerful elemental magic from a wide array of spells of your own choosing to destroy and create terrain, manipulate your mana and spells, or even summon powerful creatures to fight by your side.

name: Haunted Castle
description:
A port of Haunted Castle included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Count Dracula sleeps for a long hundred of years. During this time, peace exists at the village and Dracula is nothing but a mere legend.

However, one day a young couple named Simon and Serena were celebrating their wedding at the village's church.

The couple were enveloped with happiness, as the wedding bells rang, their future seemed blessed...

Suddenly, the empty sky was covered with dark clouds and with a rolling thunder that shook the earth, Dracula has once again awakened. Asking for the beautiful girl's blood, he flew down during the middle of the wedding and suddenly took the bride with him.

Now in order to save Serena, Simon heads to the demon castle

name: Boost Panic
description:
The Space Grand Prix has long been defined by the grace and elegance of its champions. Some legendary racers have even managed to navigate hazard-strewn courses without a single scratch on their ships.

But all that's gonna change.

You invented BOOST technology and built a ship sturdy enough to slam into walls at high speeds, and it's time to haphazardly carom your way to victory! Just cross the finish line before your ship falls apart, and you win!

Prove you're fast enough and you may even spark a revolution in the space racing scene!

name: Talking Tom 3 in Olympics
description:
Talking Tom 3 in Olympics was a Chinese bootleg mobile game that was based on "Talking Tom" app that was developed by NanJing oooo3d in 2012. The game was mostly a clone of the regular Talking Tom app, which had the player talk to Tom and he would repeat back what the player had said. In addition to that, it also featured 2 mini-games, which were milk and study.

The game notably contained the malware "Gooligan" within it, which installed rootkits and stole authentication tokens from Android devices to gain access to Google accounts, among many things. In 2013, the game was removed from the Google Play Store after the developers were sued by Outfit7 for copyright infringement.

name: EXVS2
description: The Final Mod Compile for the classic game Ultimate Knight Windom XP.

name: Yumeiro Cast: Take a Curtain Call
description:
The franchise started to be distributed in 2015, impressing with its stage/musical actor + fully voiced story + rhythm game concept
Now, and surprising everyone, Sega announced that it is working on porting the full game Yumeiro Cast as a one-time paid app for smartphones.

name: Tomb Raider: The Kurtis Trent Chronicles - Chapter 1
description:
It is the late 1990s. Former legionnaire Kurtis Trent now operates as a freelance mercenary. His specialism: the supernatural.

Following a series of mysterious deaths after the discovery of a medieval shrine deep beneath a Welsh mine, Kurtis has been hired to find whatever otherworldly force is wreaking havoc, and take care of it. Little does he know that what he is about to stumble upon will lead him down a dangerous path, one of ancient cults and arcane knowledge, that will bring him face-to-face with demons from his own past, and ultimately, into a battle for the very survival of mankind...

name: LEGO Harry Potter Collection
description: The LEGO Harry Potter: Collection brings LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 and LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7 together in one game, now remastered with enhanced graphics.

name: Sally's Salon
description: Help Sally spread her salon savvy from her hometown shopping mall to the glittering lights of Hollywood in this colorful and engaging challenge.

name: Beyond the Room
description: Beyond the Room is the eight game by Dark Dome. In this point-and-click game, you will explore an abandoned building and unravel its mysteries.

name: Fazbear Nights
description:
Dear new security guard, welcome back to Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
Since the last time you were here we actually got our paychecks! Now we have brand new systems for you to use on your job! Though... we still have to pay the bills here so we're giving you a limited amount of power, use it wisely....

name: Fazbear Nights 2: Quaesitor Mortis
description: After a long hiatus, Fazbear Entertainment welcomes you back to a brand new establishment! As Fredbear and Friends went out on indefinite vacation, it is time for new faces to take the stage and bring the joy to unprecedented levels! With outstanding ahead-of-their-time security technologies, you and your children will be safer at Freddy's than in your own home, so come on in and invite yourself to a delicious pizza, served by yours truly, Freddy Fazbear.

name: Meat Jam
description: A community map jam for Quake 1, where participants had a month to create a level focusing on meat. This pack contains 12 maps, including the start map. Runs on the Quoth mod, which is included, and adds new enemies, weapons, and powerups.

name: Beff Jezos Simulator
description: Beff Jezos Simulator is a simulation that includes all the details of owning an online sales store. Select the products, supply them, put them on sale in your online store and ship the incoming orders.

name: The Weight of Life: An Interactive Death Game of Judgement
description: Invited to take part in a shady competition known as the Judge's Game, partners Lana and Percy must work together to survive. Alongside ten other participants, they must navigate three deadly weeks of alliances, betrayals, and drama - each bookended by a fatal judgement; Someone must be chosen as the least valuable and face execution. You assume the role of either Lana or Percy in this interactive visual novel, and who lives and who dies rests entirely in your judgement.

name: Mushroom Colors
description: Mushroom Colors is an exciting endless jumping game where you play as a vibrant mushroom. Your goal is to ascend as high as possible, navigating through colorful obstacles. Each obstacle matches a specific color, and your mushroom can only pass through if it matches the obstacle's hue. Collect items to change your mushroom's color and continue your ascent. Test your reflexes and see how far you can go in this challenging and colorful adventure!

name: Pileup
description: In PILEUP you play as a green square that is trying to rise up by substituting gray squares underneath it. Since reaching the top of the green square will end the game, you must prevent it from rising. Pink rectangles will fall from above and destroy all the blocks in their path, including you. Dodge them to live as long as possible and earn more points.

name: HeliCity Demolition Man
description: Take control of a powerful demolition helicopter as you navigate through a high-stakes urban environment. Your mission? To strategically plant explosive charges in a towering construction site, all while facing off against new and unpredictable adversaries.

name: Zooika
description: Zooika is a casual puzzle game where you match animals in order to create a larger animal. It's a Suika style game with animals, leaderboards, challenges and achievements.

name: Bruma
description:
Bruma is a game about Crossing into the sea and meeting a very big fish.
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2024 by the Coletivo Brejo.

name: Driving Is Hard
description: Help Jeff to drive in his bathtub car in Driving Is Hard, a precision-based driving adventure game.

name: >Meow
description:
Play as a robot catgirl named K0tya who is trying to help her Master locate the missing lab rats (ignore the fact that said Master's forgetfulness is the reason they are missing in the first place).

Explore the research facility that you live in and find those missing critters before the morning shift starts, or your Master gets in trouble.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Drudging, Drifting, Dreaming
description:
Version 7.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter IV: A Shore Under Watch
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Schicksal's Imperative (Theresa)
• New Featured Event: Born From A Dream
• ...and more!

name: Dusk City
description: A flourishing civilization had sunk into the sea. The night never dawns...... and a sense of apocalypse hangs over the world. You'll land on an island in such a world, and as you explore the town and ruins, you'll come into contact with fragments of the world's mysteries.

name: Mom Hid My Game! Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Everbloom
description: Everbloom is a cute and cozy farming social sim set in a world of whimsy - grow buckets of popcorn right on the plant and make chocolate milk by feeding your cows candy bars. Grow, care, build, decorate, and explore the world of Everbloom solo or with your friends.

name: Undergrounded
description: “Undergrounded” is a puzzle adventure where you explore a dungeon formed by the accumulation of American history. Become Scott, who wandered underground in search of his lost engagement ring after failing to propose to his girlfriend, and plumb the depths of the past itself with your buddy Canary!

name: WinWar II
description: A strategy game similar to Risk set in World War II.

name: Wikipedia Speedrun
description: The goal of the game is to navigate from a starting wikipedia article to another one, in the least amount of clicks and time.

name: Street Fighter V: Champion Edition + Season 5 Premium Pass Bundle
description: This bundle includes "Street Fighter V: Champion Edition" and "Street Fighter V - Season 5 Premium Pass".

name: Street Fighter V: Season 5 Premium Pass
description: The Street Fighter V - Season 5 Premium Pass allows access to the 5 characters joining the roster in Season 5, Dan/Rose/Oro/Akira/Luke, as well as new stages and costumes for existing characters.

description:
This game was made for the #lowrezjam.
Some dragon talked shit bout your moms... Now it's payback time! Fight your way through deadly flies, crazy shooting mages, explosive bumping red things and not-that-bright golems to go and shut that fool's mouth.

name: Not Quite Vegas
description: A short map making use of Nick Baker and Sam Woodman's Morister Resources texture pack.

name: The Missing Daughter
description:
A missing person, a shady investigation, the mob on your back... Only your deductive skills will allow you to make progress in this difficult case.

"The Missing Daughter" is a card-based investigation game made for #AdvJam2019 under 2 weeks. It features a unique mechanic to investigate, gather clues and interrogate people.

Refill your batteries to avoid staying in a collapsing world by solving puzzles!

This rule-discovering game was made for the Theana GameJam#27 in 7 days. Around 1 hour of playtime, with a bonus challenging section for the more motivated players. It draws heavy game-design inspiration from games like Taiji or The Witness.

name: Federation Mycha
description: Step into a world over run with Mycha, a strange mineral with seemingly magical powers. Clear monster-infested environments and protect researchers on your own or with up to three other players online. Welcome to The Federation.

name: Physiblock
description: A physics-based first person parkour puzzle game, go through various tests as a test robot and be careful not to fall into the water, not to get caught by other robots and to use objects that will help you cross carefully, the game will be released on itch.io on September 5th, would you like to see what life is like through the eyes of a robot? Then grab your computers and wait for September 5th!

name: Providence
description: Providence is a free-to-play multiplayer co-op survival shooter with a strong narrative, challenging combat, and a unique player-driven economy. Providence is set in a universe ravaged by a catastrophic event known as the Singularity. Players, known as Trailblazers, explore alien worlds, compete for resources and craft items to survive.

name: Prophesy of Pendor
description:
From the Founding of Pendor - the year is 354. A King has not ruled the shattered land of Pendor for many generations. What was once a proud accomplishment of man now is steeped in the myths of folklore and told as children’s bedtime stories. Yet, the legends live on of a prophesy of hope. A tale of a champion who comes from a distant shore and unites the lords of Pendor under a single Ruler and brings peace and prosperity once again to this ravaged war-torn land. All is not as it seems as there are many powers who have their own ends in mind and an epic struggle is about to unfold.

Strap on your sword, and buckle your imagination. Prepare to enter the world of Pendor and accept the challenge of the Prophesy - if you dare.

A total conversion mod of Mount & Blade Warband, it introduces entirely new factions, overhauled mechanics, deep immersion, and a completely original story filled with fleshed out characters, kingdoms, and mythologies.

Your new job takes you to the bottom of a giant pit, where the only thing to keep you company is an old one-way fax machine. Survive unrelenting underground storms and get back to the surface safely after finishing ten shifts.

description: Take control of Peter as he travels across the kingdom, solving puzzles, making friends and defeating monsters. This game is designed to be accessible to a very broad range of players, including young children and people learning English as a second language.

description: Ever thought "Damn they did ma boy starlo dirty in the genocide route", yeah a lot of people did. well now we finally have a fight against him on this route in this fangame.

description: Too Many Nights is a FNaF fangame that doesn't follow the usual 5-night structure normally seen in other games. Instead, it's an endless endurance test where every night you have to pick more enemies, extra penalties, or purchasable shop items to deal with or take advantage of in the future.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of EXP
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Kushi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist EXP, and "Ara Mitama," demons that drop items that give ally demons EXP.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Wealth
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Saki Mitama", demons that drop items that can be sold for Macca.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Miracles
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Nigi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist Glory, points needed to learn new Miracles.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Constriction: 1024
description: Based both on Congestion 1024 and Claustrophobia 1024, all the maps have a playable area of 1024x1024 Doom map units or less using OTEX. You can't escape the boundaries of the maps, but your enemies can.

name: NoLimits 2: Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional License
description: This Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2.

name: No Recollection: Swimsuit DLC!
description: This DLC will allow you to enable swimsuit outfits for the main cast! You can finally live out the fantasy of seeing them half naked!

name: Starway Ateez
description: Starway Ateez is an Android puzzle game developed by Snowballs Inc. It's a simple and friendly game that everyone can enjoy. The game features match-three puzzles with Ateez . Players need to put three same blocks together to pop them. Matching four or more same blocks will create special blocks that can help clear the board faster.

name: Something Is Wrong With My World Map
description:
"Something is wrong with my World Map" is a puzzle game, where you need to play with various sizes in the world map in order to create the right path to continue.

Switch size by exiting a village on a different side, or even by simply opening the map!

Step on a mountain to flatten it, or switch to the small size to enter caves!

Will you "step up" to the challenge?

name: Ode of Resurrection
description: Oldsk00lish challenging semi non-linear techbase.

name: Elegy for Them Vigil
description: A sequel to the previous map Ode of Resurrection, Elegy is a nonlinear "tech base being turned into an outpost of hell"-themed map.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional character pack vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane"
description:
Additional character pack Vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane" includes the following:

1. Added playable character "Riko, Mari"
2. New story "Riko, Mari"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Lily, Nightwicked Mari, Fledgling Yohane"
4. New summoning card "Mirage Shield"
5. Yohane's new costume "Astrologer"

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Fledgling"
description:
The costume "Fledgling" contains the following elements:

・ Costume "Fledgling"
Change into a cute "Fledgling" costume and adventure in the mirror world!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Lucky Outfit"
description:
The costume "Lucky Outfit" includes the following elements.

・ Costume "Lucky Outfit"
Yohane clothes worn during the girls' association
Wear your favorite clothes that Yohane worn in the girls -only gathering and adventure in the mirror world!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Far far away"
description:
The costume "Far far away" contains the following elements:

・ Costume "Far far away"
Yohane costume I wore when singing Far far away
Let's adventure in the mirror world wearing a refreshing costume that is based on green and white!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Trendy Schoolgirl"
description:
The costume "Trendy Schoolgirl" includes the following elements:

- Costume "Trendy Schoolgirl"
This is the cutting edge of Tokai! ?
A costume that draws out a completely different charm from the usual Yohane.
The Lailaps strap on the bag is a charm point!
Let's adventure in the mirror world with Yohane with a different figure than usual!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - "Yohane the Parhelion" song set
description:
The following elements are included in the "Yohane the Parhelion" song set.

-"Yohane the Parhelion" song set
A song set that you can listen to!
Includes a total of 4 songs, comprising three tracks featured in 'Yohane the Parhelion -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR-' plus the theme song 'Deep Blue' from 'Yohane the Parhelion -BLAZE in the DEEPBLUE-'!

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Cagnali's Order
description:
Resist Cagnali’s Order!
A new threat is coming to Rockay City as the police force cooperates with a new rival – Cagnali Industries!

Stop Cagnali’s high-tech army’s rapid advancements before Rockay City becomes a totalitarian dystopia. Fight against a robot army in new big heists with brand new story, enemies, soundtrack and more!

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Tactical Weapon Pack
description:
Up your strategy game with the first Tactical Weapon Pack for Crime Boss: Rockay City, including the following firearms:

• Slate 36: A semi-automatic rifle which will help you taking over Rockay City!
• Fiver Tactical: This handgun is a beauty of its own and will be with you until the end.
• Bohema: Who does not like an automatic pistol, which you can easily sneak into any bank?
• Urban Sweeper: Do you need to win an argument on the streets? This shotgun will be your best friend!

name: Terry The Turtle's Big Adventure
description: Terry the Turtle carries his house on his back, but what makes a house a home? Can Terry help all the lost animals?

name: Castle of Asleep
description:
One-way non-field RPG.

Released in Japan in 2015, this released version in 2022 is fully translated into English.
Proceed while defeating enemies that appear in your path, picking up items, and investigating. Reach the sleeping castle in less than 3 minutes.

name: The Springlock: Aftermath
description:
In a timeline where Henry's plan has failed...
You're working for a group of investigators who are trying to get rich information about Fazbear Entertainment and their connection with William Afton. Your job is to investigate the old private warehouse of Fazbear Entertainment and save all possible information to the cloud storage. Things get worse when spectral visitors arrive. So, are you ready for the third round?

A sequel, Pachislot Akumajou Dracula II, was released in 2010. It features much the same cast as the original game, which is based on the cast of Castlevania: Curse of Darkness and Castlevania: Lament of Innocence.
It was followed by Pachislot Akumajou Dracula III in 2012. It features much of the cast of Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse, including Trevor, Alucard, Sypha, Succubus, Doppelganger and Dracula.

FFV-Pixel Freemaster comes in two varieties with a ton of new QOL improvements including innuberable bugfixes, a new game plus, visible job class sprites in map, MSU1 cd quality audio, super custom classes, amazing optional patches like a fixed 2x abp,xp,and gil or a no encounters mode that allows you to get into a random battle by pressing start and many more!

name: The Search for Salmon
description:
The Search for Salmon is an expert-level Kaizo. The aim of this hack isn't to troll or torture the player, but rather to provide an extremely difficult challenge in a fair and interesting way. Players will need to employ a wide range of Kaizo and Item Abuse skills. Shell, spring, and p-switch tricks are used alongside tight platforming and jump control. Beginners will likely be very frustrated, but seasoned players will hopefully find a fresh, fun challenge. There are however, a few Kaizo boxes (both marked and un-marked) and few tricks and traps along the way. The game also features optional coins to collect for "100%" runs, and some secret rooms and surprises to discover. There's even a checkpoint-save room so console players can rest without fear of losing any progress! Extensive play-testing has been done by myself and others to confirm that the entire game is indeed RTA-viable. I hope you enjoy it!
Edit - Had to fix a few more potential music problems that would lead to crashes. Everything should be solid now.

name: Bleemcast! for Metal Gear Solid
description:
Bleemcast!, also known as Bleem! for Dreamcast, is an unlicensed commercial emulator developed and published by Bleem! for use with the Sega Dreamcast. By taking advantage of loopholes within the Dreamcast's Mil-CD format, Bleemcast! software allows the system to run select PlayStation games, often with enhanced graphics. Each Bleemcast! disc is intended for a single PlayStation game only, and is utilized by first booting the Dreamcast with the Bleemcast! disc, and then later swapping in the PlayStation game at a specific time.

While running under Bleemcast!, PlayStation games adopt anti-aliasing and bilinear filtering, as well as an increased resolution of 640x480 (double the PlayStation's 320x240). All released Bleemcast! games require a dedicated VMU to play and save progress, while also supporting the Jump Pack for vibration.

name: Abomi Nation: Monster Rifts
description: Battle teams of Abomis in this turn-based roguelike monster-tamer where the matchups change every run! Recruit creatures from several different indie universes to help close the rifts destroying Abomi Nation. Create your own Abomis or download others from Steam Workshop for infinite possibilities

name: The Crow
description:
The Crow - Is java game based on Famous Brandon Lee film!
Dark roofs of faceless houses, dullness of rain, gray weekdays. He appears under the veil of the night. He is full with power and thirsty for revenge, he is – invincible, he is – the Crow! If you remember and love the legendary movie «the Crow» where the main role was brilliantly played by Brandon Lee, you should not miss its mobile version, which carries you back to the fantastic world of Gothic mystery and legends.

name: Blobbton
description:
The eccentric Architect of a utopian future society has decided to build a skyward city out of hexagon-shaped blocks. Unfortunately, the Architect is a perfectionist, and his ever-changing mood constantly alters the ideal plan. As his apprentice, it's your responsibility to fulfill his ever-changing wishes for the perfect possible layout and to earn his approval!

Blobbton is a bright and colorful world of hexagon-based puzzles. With its casual yet challenging-to-master approach, players of all skill levels can enjoy quick and peaceful puzzle-solving sessions!

name: Spam
description:
Explore the different cards and let your imagination run wild to develop an original strategy. Once you're ready for battle, jump into the arena and face players from around the world in a dynamic duel that will require observation and adaptation. Each victory will allow you to earn new cards and expand your possibilities.
Beware, strategy can hide where you least expect it.

name: Dragon Spirits 2
description: In this modern urban-themed RPG, you can collect nearly a hundred different dragon spirits, experiment with skill setups, assemble teams, and devise strategies to build your dragon spirit squad. Adventure through the virtual spaces in Metapolis, and uncover the conspiracy behind it all.

name: Clockwatch
description:
A text-based web game for April Fool's, where you can "collect" the current time of day, such as 5:10. You can only collect the current minute, so real-time waiting is necessary. There are tables for tracking collection of different categories of time, such as "Ascending" times like 2:34 or 12:34. There are also achievements for collecting every time in a particular category.

Hardcore gamers will play in real time but a cheat mode is available for casuals.

name: Art for Snakes
description:
ART for Snakes is a single player snake-ish game by Splerp, Cheeseness, and lcl. Be a snake, eat the most expensive paintings you can before the time limit runs out.
"Our gallery provides snake-friendly access to all floors. Please do not climb on or touch the exhibits (unless nobody is watching)."
Use snake-like controls to move through and leap from painting to painting across a branching 4 course campaign.
ART for Snakes is intended to become challenging as it progresses, but for players who'd prefer a more relaxed experience, there is a "zen mode" available that removes time constraints.

name: Fill The Cup
description: Main challenge lies in maneuvering the water stream around various obstacles that block the direct path to the glass. However, the player doesn't have an infinite supply of water. This means that players must use their resources wisely, ensuring they avoid unnecessary obstacles and carefully plan their water usage to collect all the stars and to make a happy glass full of water.

name: Fruboom
description: Toss fruits to find their matching pairs! As you play, the fruits change color and become trickier to match, adding an exciting challenge. Designed with young players in mind, it’s a simple, kid-friendly experience perfect for even the littlest hands. Bright visuals and easy-to-understand gameplay make it a joyful adventure for all ages!

name: Countdown To Death
description: 41 total speedmaps, all of which were made in an hour or less.

name: Risimon
description: Risimon is an adventure & monster-taming game combining an off-the-wall tone with a retro, yet restyled, aesthetic. Experience a hilarious journey across the Issou region. Catch Risimon, train them and fight to prove to yourself that you are NOT a loser!

name: Scallion RPG
description:
Scallion RPG is a Monster Taming RPG, where you travel the world collect Scallions and battle by transforming into them. With three party members transforming into Scallions at once for a 3v3 battle, your journey is going to be fun and exciting.

Your main goal is explore all region and collect 5 Artifact from Tower Trails and become the ultimate Scallion Master.

You will come along many NPCs in your journey which can join you in and help you in achieving your goal.

name: Unlich
description: Unlich is a pixel art dark fantasy monster-taming RPG with grid battles, focused on exploration and customization.

name: Pipkin
description: Explore a magical and spooky world, capture wild Pipkin, and fight alongside them, as you uncover a series of mysterious events happening around New Haven...

name: EvoBots
description: EvoBots is a mobile adventure inspired by classic games of the monster-taming genre. As part of the Ground Expedition Team you will collect a wide variety of mechanical creatures and use them in turn-based battles. To become a real EvoBot expert you have to master the puzzle elements of the five different energy types to gain the decisive advantage in combat. Can you unravel the dark mysteries of the world of EvoBots?

name: Day at the Office: Prologue
description: Try to escape from the office, make your decisions carefully, and keep your cool to get home safe and sound... Do you hear that...? The phone is ringing, and it's for you.

name: Emiru Game
description: The First Rhythm game in where there is now over 30+ buttons pressed for each note on rhythm. Each song will feature songs by Marcus Owen Bell.

name: Professional Bull Riding: Out of the Chute
description:
A PSP Port of "PBR: Out of the Chute".

Gear up and get ready for the ride of your life. Players may create their own character and compete in season mode as a professional rider or a tenacious bull throughout 10 three-round events in multiple locations, including New York, Anaheim, and Las Vegas. Riders like Guilherme Marchi, Justin McBride and Chris Shivers as well as some of the most “rank” bulls from the tour are at your control. Compete in season mode or go head to head with your friends. Unlimited Ride mode tests players’ skills as a rider or bull until the rider is bucked off. Rider Rush puts you “in the zone” to maximize your score. Intuitive controls and multiple difficulty levels allow everyone to play, have fun and be challenged. Realistic sounds, heart-pounding music, official PBR rules and scoring capture the essence of being in the PBR.

The long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed casual fighting fan game "Digital Tamers: ReBorn" is finally here!

Embark on the Digital World and find new friends, adventures, and surprises! With more than 100 challenges, 50 unique quests, and more than 380 different Digimon to collect, the Digital World is yours to explore as you wish!

The goal of the game is to make as many combinations as possible while you have room on the board.

The game has global rankings and monthly prizes.

description: The author worked almost 7 months on these 3 combined levels that take place in Rome. This is his most complicated project I have built till now. Many big locations, exploring, puzzles, action and atmosphere. It's all there. When you find all 7 secrets in the first 2 outside levels an actionpacked bonusstage awaits you.

name: Tides Odyssey
description: Tides Odyssey is an immersive adventure inviting you to explore mysterious archipelagos. Dive deep into rich mechanics, from straightforward resource gathering to intricate crafting, cultivation, and culinary delights. With each discovery, new biomes unlock, expanding the horizons of your journey.

name: 03:17 am
description:
"03:17 am" was made in 8 days for the #AdvJam2017 (Adventure Jam 2017).
It's a narrative game set up in a closed, theatrical scene and inspired by Hopper's Nighthawks painting.

It features a 3-track soundtrack made by electronic producer LeGone (accessible through the jukebox when outside a conversation).

If you're stuck (not likely to happen, but who knows), maybe have a look at the screenshots, it might help...

One-room loft is the new trend!!!

So as the best real estate agent in town, you can't let that opportunity pass. Wait! There are no more one-room lofts left to rent??

That won't stop you... You can perfectly turn any average flat into a shining one-room loft!

name: Where there once was sand
description:
In the middle of an endless desert, an old professor is giving his last efforts trying to discover what he've sought his whole life: the lost civilization of Mu. A life spent in the hunt of a myth, yet without any conclusive finding to support his theory that the continent is now buried under the sand.

His funding has been cut and the camp site is now to be turned into a mining complex. As a sentient machine sent to prospect the surroundings for geological opportunities, will you try to empathize with him, will try to help him unveil what may lie beneath the sand, or will you just limit yourself to what you've been sent for?

You may well be the help Dr. Willis had been expecting all this time...

name: Square
description:
Small intent at a platformer puzzler, explore to understand the mechanics the game is quite self explanatory... or not (SPOILER: if not, try to find the red cubes and find out what to do with them).

Made in 48h for #familiargamejam5 by R3nD (theme was "Deconstruction").

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Wild Card
description:
In the Star Wars Outlaws: Wild Card narrative expansion, keep exploring the world of Star Wars Outlaws with an all-new story, quests, and areas to discover.

Kay is hired to infiltrate a high-stakes sabacc tournament, but as she crosses paths with the notorious gambler Lando Calrissian, she soon learns that another game is being played.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: A Pirate's Fortune
description: "A Pirate's Fortune" is the second story expansion for Star Wars Outlaws, an open world action adventure game from Ubisoft. The Trailblazer’s reputation precedes Kay as she runs into veteran pirate Hondo Ohnaka, who is looking to settle old scores with a ruthless gang of pirates.

name: Zen Drift
description: A new way to experience car drifting. Enjoy every turn in a calm and easy driving. Just let your car drift and slide down the road. Catch the Zen!

name: Pin Strike
description: Bowling can be played not only in the hall and only on a straight track. And who says you can't use bombs or springs in the game?

name: Animal Battle Arena
description: Roll your tough fighting beasts into the arena and compete for the right to be the best. Even the cute panda can beat his rivals, and the turtle isn't so slow when it comes to the big animal fight.

name: Fruits' Harvest Sorter
description: Sort the fruits of this season!

name: The Jumping Donut
description: From the creative minds at The Jumping Food Games comes a brand new, delicious adventure: "The Jumping Donut". Take on the role of a juicy donut and master 27 exciting levels in this unique puzzle platformer!

name: Boys Race
description: You will have a long and difficult road to victory. You know it's better not to go it alone, right? Get your Boys together and get to the finish! Not everyone will make it, but those who do will help the others reach the finish line. It's a team effort and a team victory.

name: Space Surveyor
description: Space Surveyor is an arcade-style UFO surveying and landing game. Your objective is to collect coins, avoid enemies, and land in a designated landing spot. Master the UFO controls and rack up these high scores!

name: 2048 Snake
description: Imagine a mix of classic snake and puzzle game 2048 and there you have a unique gameplay in front of you that you can try right now. Run and grow your snake on different challenging levels and discover new big numbers on the cubes.

name: Forest Cafe Simulator
description: It's time to take care of cute animals and build a cozy cafe for them in a forest clearing. Get everything ready for the reception. Add various tasty dishes and drinks to the menu.

name: Lost in You
description: Take on the role of [REDACTED], an 18 year old senior high school student trying to move on from a rough breakup. Meet new people and cross paths with old acquaintances as you try to build and maintain relationships in the fictional Japanese city of Jakuofo. As you grow closer to everyone they'll start to open up more and you'll soon come to realise that life isn't all fun and games for those around you either. But worry not, the city is your playground to do as you please! Or is it...? Perhaps not everything is as it appears at first... Only time will tell.

name: 5 Minutes to Kill
description: 5 Minutes to Kill is a speed mapping project where every consecutive map in the set gets 5 more minutes of mapping time. Starting at 5 minutes with MAP1, 10 minutes with MAP02, 15 minutes with MAP03, etc. The levels are organized by mapping time, NOT by difficulty, and the mapset is also a bit of a variety pack, with gameplay ranging from classic techbases, to combat challenges, to slaughter.

name: Zero Tolerance

name: Super Hyper Hippo
description: Only Super Hyper Hippo can prevent the evil Darth Mole from flooding the land with boulders!Dash through the levels, find the hidden orbs and defeat your archnemesis once and for all!

name: Spacetour Express
description:
The Spacetour Express travel agency is here to provide the best destinations in the Milky Way.

Send tourists, scientists or military personnel to various planets, earn prestige, money and research tokens. But take care of your ships, as sending them to hostile planets may result in dramatic endings.

Oh also, try not to dissatisfy too many of your loyal customers, or else you might see some stowaways crawl up your ships...

name: Unstackable
description:
When the worst property developer decides to invest on a remote and inaccessible island, you and your tugboat are the only ones who can help and build the most charming housing project.

Pick up the buildings and send them flying on the island so that people can start moving in right away (or not)...

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Midnight Cat
description:
In "Rooftop Rascal: The Midnight Cat," you control a clever cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop.
The gameplay centres on jumps, and quick thinking.
Your goal is to climb as high as you can and reach the rooftop.
